title: Idhayam Unnai Theduthe Lyrics Naan Sigappu Manithan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Â Idhayam Unnai Theduthe
Singer: GV Prakash & Saindhavi
Music: GV Prakash
Movie: Naan sigappu manithan

Ven panju megaththil
en nenjai nee vaithai
penne un punnagaiyil, saaral naanadi.

Kannukkul veedondru
kattithaan vaitheyney
angae nee vandha pinne, kovil aanadhey

Idhayam unnai thaedudhey
uyirum unnai thaeedudhey
unnai thaedi odudhey
uyrin uyire..

Ninaivum unnai thaedudhey
nizhaum unnai thaedudhey
unnai thaedi odudhey
uyirn uyire,..

Adi penney, irandhaalum
un madiyil, kanmoodathaaney
odi vandhu uyir viduven.

Oru paarvai, nee paarthaal
adhu podhum, ippodhey
naan meendum mannil
uyirthezhuven.

Ven panju megaththil
en nenjai nee vaithai
penne un punnagaiyil, saaral naanadi.

Kannukkul veedondru
kattithaan vaitheyney
angae nee vandha pinne, kovil aanadhey

Iraivaa oru varam kodu
ivan endhan maganaagave.
dhinam dhorum mazha vidu
ohh thaayaagi thaalattave.

Engae nee sendraalum
en kaalgal eppodhum
un pinnethaan nadakkum
Oh.. aagaayam saaindhaalum
boologam oindhaalum
nam kadhaldhaan irukkum..

Ven panju megaththil
en nenjai nee vaithai
penne un punnagaiyil, saaral naanadi.

Kannukkul veedondru
kattithaan vaitheyney
angae nee vandha pinne, kovil aanadhey

Idhayam unnai thaedudhey
uyirum unnai thaeedudhey
unnai thaedi odudhey
uyrin uyire..

Adi penney, irandhaalum
un madiyil, kanmoodathaaney
odi vandhu uyir viduven.

Oru paarvai, nee paarthaal
adhu podhum, ippodhey
naan meendum mannil
uyirthezhuven.
